item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“k1ng0frs, post:5, topic:470801”]case 111111: if(c.playerRights > 0) { c.sendMessage("This is a staff member only zone."); return; } //teleport,message break; [/quote]
^^ Best code

case 111111:
if(c.playerRights > 0) {
c.sendMessage("This is a staff member only zone.");
return;
} else {
//teleport,message
}
break;

Here’s a suggestion:

Make it only return so the players will think there is no staffzone. It’s kinda noticable if you do, “Sorry. Only staff are allowed here.”

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

case 102090: //Staff Zone
c.sendMessage(“This is the staff only sorry .”);

if (c.playerRights == 1) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 2) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 3) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
break;

c.sendMessage(“This is the staff only sorry .”);
change this is the staff only sorry…

Example…
c.sendMessage(“Host Gushers is amazing.”);

And if u do not want this message just delete it…

case 102090: //Staff Zone

if (c.playerRights == 1) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 2) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 3) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 0) {
c.sendMessage(“This is the staff only sorry .”);
}
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

[quote=“BeastChris, post:1, topic:470801”]so i was adding a staff zone and i added this code to clickingbuttons.java [code]case 102090: //Staff Zone
c.sendMessage(“This is the staff only sorry .”);

if (c.playerRights == 1) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 2) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 3) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
break;[/code]

So if you are not staff it woulod come up whith that message so everything is working but then i go to my staff acc and click on it and it teleport me and then comes up whith “This is the staff only sorry” so how would i make it so if you are staff it does not come up whith the message [/quote]

try this:
[sup]case 102090: //Staff Zone

if (c.playerRights == 1) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 2) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 3) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3094, 3107, 0, “modern”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 0) {
c.sendMessage(“This is the staff only sorry .”);
}
break;[/sup]

}

}
break;[/code]

So if you are not staff it woulod come up whith that message so everything is working but then i go to my staff acc and click on it and it teleport me and then comes up whith “This is the staff only sorry” so how would i make it so if you are staff it does not come up whith the message
